body_text: How did everything start off in Darker Than Black? I've finished the first season and still do not understand how contractors came about.
How does one become a Contractor? How are Contractors made in Darker than Black?  Do you have to be born with the powers?  Or do you have to make contact with a spirit and make a contract with it?
